column6: The first ULTIMATE IRON MAN mini-series by bestselling sci-fi author Orson Scott Card (ENDER'S GAME, SPEAKER OF THE DEAD) and Andy Kubert (1602, ORIGIN, X-MEN) comes to a conclusion!!  The government discovers young Tony Stark and sees how valuable he can be to them.  They want him to come be part of the Baxter Building think-tank.  But what will they do if Tony refuses?
column8: | writer:Orson Scott Card | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Richard Isanove | penciller:Andy Kubert | inker:Danny K. Miki
